Black Anzil was a feared and infamous pirate from Turmish who prowled the Sea of Fallen Stars in the early 13 century DR.
Black Anzil was a follower of the legendary Immurk the Invincible, the Great Pirate, sailing as part of his fleet of 100 ships based at Dragonisle. However, after Immurks death in the , a half-dozen rival pirates each claimed to be Immurks successor and broke the fleet apart between them and turned on each other in the Pirate Wars. Black Anzil rose to prominence in this period.While it is only known that Anzil appeared at this time, it may be assumed he was previously a follower of Immurk and may have been one of the rival claimants. This is supported by Anzil having Immurks shield.
In the , Black Anzil was recorded to be in the possession of Jhalanrojir, the shield of Immurk himself. However, he later lost it and three more pirates would wield the Pirateshield even before Black Aznil died in the .
Anzil was notably an owner of Jhalanrojir, the Pirateshield, a magical shield.
One of the cruelest pirates of his day, Black Anzil had his captured foes covered in pitch, and then lit on fire.
